Name: objoid
Description: The OID of the object this description pertains to

Name: classoid
Description: The OID of the system catalog this object appears in

Name: objsubid
Description: For a comment on a table column, this is the column number (the objoid and classoid refer to the table itself). For all other object types, this column is zero.

Name: description
Description: Arbitrary text that serves as the description of this object
